name: Bowie Knives
text: The knives made legendary by Jim Bowie live on as new incarnations of speed, elegance and danger.

name: Camp Knives
text: The original low-emission chainsaw, Camp Knives combine brutal toughness and elegance.

name: Daggers
text: Before you could call 9-1-1, this was how you handled dangerous situations.

name: Hunters
text: The most fun you can have putting meat in the freezer.

name: Fighters
text: Light, fast and pointy, Fighters are the knife you would take to a gunfight.

name: Chef's Knives
text: A Chef's Knife is a knife that belongs to the chef, not to the kitchen.  It is personal and it's valuable.

name: Military Knives
text: Tough enough for fighting men and women around the world.  (See, I have to include "women" to be P.C., but now it just sounds like domestic violence.)  Fighting men.  That sounds better...
